    • Method Detail

      • openGui

        public void openGui()
        sets up GUI interface. Creates 2 text boxes in a window and lets user input in both. Once user inputs in one textbox, the convert keylistener method is called to check the input.

      • addKeyListenerArabic

        This checks the Arabic text boxt for correct input and if it is it will print the conversion into the roman text box

      • addKeyListenerRoman

        public void addKeyListenerRoman​(javax.swing.JTextField RomanText,
                                javax.swing.JLabel label,
                                javax.swing.JTextField ArabicText)
        This method checks the user input in the roman text box. If the input is correct convert and print it to the arabic text box.
